entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border this evening. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:07 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:07 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount possibly reaching 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:07 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
